languages.text: "Я совсем не ожидала того, что вы ему скажете. Что укажете жестко на то, как надо брать судьбу в свои руки, вместо того чтоб кидаться и утешать. Это были... смелые слова. Честные. То, что они обращены были к неразумному юноше, не делает их менее ценными. Я посмотрела на вас по-новому в тот момент".

traits.locale_text: "Я совсем не ожидала того, что вы ему скажете. Что укажете жестко на то, как надо брать судьбу в свои руки, вместо того чтоб кидаться и утешать. Это были... смелые слова. Честные. То, что они обращены были к неразумному юноше, не делает их менее ценными. Я посмотрела на вас по-новому в тот момент".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I was blindsided when you said what you did. You sternly told him about the importance of grabbing the reins of one's own fate, instead of rushing to console him. Those were... brave words. Honest. The fact that they were addressed to a thoughtless boy does not diminish their worth. I saw you in a new light in that moment."
languages.original_text: "Я совсем не ожидала того, что вы ему скажете. Что укажете жестко на то, как надо брать судьбу в свои руки, вместо того чтоб кидаться и утешать. Это были... смелые слова. Честные. То, что они обращены были к неразумному юноше, не делает их менее ценными. Я посмотрела на вас по-новому в тот момент".

traits.locale_text: "I was blindsided when you said what you did. When you sternly told him about the importance of grabbing the reins of one's own fate, instead of struggling to console him. Those were... brave words. Honest. The fact that they were addressed at a senseless boy does not take away from their worth. I saw you in a new light back then."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

Those were... brave words. Honest. The fact that they were addressed to a thoughtless boy does not diminish their worth. I saw you in a new light in that moment."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “当你说出那番话的时候，我真的是大吃一惊。你并没有急于安慰他，而是严厉地告诫他必须抓住命运的缰绳。那些话……很勇敢，也很诚实。尽管这些话是说给一个不成熟的孩子听的，但它依然充满了道理。从那一刻起，我便开始以全新的眼光来看待你了。”
languages.original_text: "I was blindsided when you said what you did. You sternly told him about the importance of grabbing the reins of one's own fate, instead of rushing to console him. Those were... brave words. Honest. The fact that they were addressed to a thoughtless boy does not diminish their worth. I saw you in a new light in that moment."

traits.locale_text: “当你说出那番话的时候，我真的是大吃一惊。你并没有急于安慰他，而是严厉地告诫他必须抓住命运的缰绳。那些话……很勇敢，也很诚实。尽管这些话是说给一个不成熟的孩子听的，但它依然充满了道理。从那一刻起，我便开始以全新的眼光来看待你了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Me sorprendió lo que dijo en su momento. Le habló firmemente de la importancia de tomar las riendas del destino de cada uno en vez de acudir a consolarlo. Fueron palabras... valientes. Sinceras. El que fueran dirigidas a un chaval atolondrado no merma el valor que encierran. En ese momento, le vi de otra forma».
languages.original_text: "I was blindsided when you said what you did. You sternly told him about the importance of grabbing the reins of one's own fate, instead of rushing to console him. Those were... brave words. Honest. The fact that they were addressed to a thoughtless boy does not diminish their worth. I saw you in a new light in that moment."

traits.locale_text: «Me sorprendió lo que dijo en su momento. Le habló firmemente de la importancia de tomar las riendas del destino de cada uno en vez de acudir a consolarlo. Fueron palabras... valientes. Sinceras. El que fueran dirigidas a un chaval atolondrado no merma el valor que encierran. En ese momento, le vi de otra forma».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「御身の言葉には驚かされました。陛下は慌てて彼を慰めるのではなく、自分自身の運命の手綱をつかむことの重要性を彼に厳しく説かれた。それは…勇敢な言葉だった。正直だった。軽率な少年に向けた言葉だからといって、その価値が下がるわけではありません。あの瞬間、我は陛下に新しい光を見たのだ」
languages.original_text: "I was blindsided when you said what you did. You sternly told him about the importance of grabbing the reins of one's own fate, instead of rushing to console him. Those were... brave words. Honest. The fact that they were addressed to a thoughtless boy does not diminish their worth. I saw you in a new light in that moment."

traits.locale_text: 「御身の言葉には驚かされました。陛下は慌てて彼を慰めるのではなく、自分自身の運命の手綱をつかむことの重要性を彼に厳しく説かれた。それは…勇敢な言葉だった。正直だった。軽率な少年に向けた言葉だからといって、その価値が下がるわけではありません。あの瞬間、我は陛下に新しい光を見たのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe Eure Worte an ihn zunächst nicht verstanden. Ihr habt ihm in aller Strenge gesagt, er müsse die Zügel seines Schicksals selbst in die Hand nehmen, und habt ihn nicht getröstet. Eure Worte waren ... mutig. Ehrlich. Dass sie an einen gedankenlosen Jungen gerichtet waren, schmälert nicht ihren Wert. In diesem Moment habe ich Euch in einem anderen Licht gesehen."
languages.original_text: "I was blindsided when you said what you did. You sternly told him about the importance of grabbing the reins of one's own fate, instead of rushing to console him. Those were... brave words. Honest. The fact that they were addressed to a thoughtless boy does not diminish their worth. I saw you in a new light in that moment."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Eure Worte an ihn zunächst nicht verstanden. Ihr habt ihm in aller Strenge gesagt, er müsse die Zügel seines Schicksals selbst in die Hand nehmen, und habt ihn nicht getröstet. Eure Worte waren ... mutig. Ehrlich. Dass sie an einen gedankenlosen Jungen gerichtet waren, schmälert nicht ihren Wert. In diesem Moment habe ich Euch in einem anderen Licht gesehen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Votre réaction m'a prise au dépourvu. Au lieu de vous empresser de le consoler, vous l'avez sévèrement exhorté à prendre les rênes de son destin. Des paroles... pleines de courage, d'honnêteté. Le fait qu'elles étaient adressées à un garçon irréfléchi ne diminue pas leur valeur. Je vous ai {mf|vu|vue} sous un nouveau jour à ce moment. »
languages.original_text: "I was blindsided when you said what you did. You sternly told him about the importance of grabbing the reins of one's own fate, instead of rushing to console him. Those were... brave words. Honest. The fact that they were addressed to a thoughtless boy does not diminish their worth. I saw you in a new light in that moment."

traits.locale_text: « Votre réaction m'a prise au dépourvu. Au lieu de vous empresser de le consoler, vous l'avez sévèrement exhorté à prendre les rênes de son destin. Des paroles... pleines de courage, d'honnêteté. Le fait qu'elles étaient adressées à un garçon irréfléchi ne diminue pas leur valeur. Je vous ai {mf|vu|vue} sous un nouveau jour à ce moment. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Sözlerin beni tamamen gafil avladı Hür Tacir. Kaderin dizginlerini eline almanın önemini açıkladın, teselli etmek için gerçeği saklamadın. Sözlerin... Oldukça cesurdu. Her şeyden öte dürüsttü. Patavatsız gencin tekine sarf ettiğin bu sözlerin değeri, göz ardı edilemez. O anda sana bambaşka bir açıdan bakmaya başladım."
languages.original_text: "I was blindsided when you said what you did. You sternly told him about the importance of grabbing the reins of one's own fate, instead of rushing to console him. Those were... brave words. Honest. The fact that they were addressed to a thoughtless boy does not diminish their worth. I saw you in a new light in that moment."

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerin beni tamamen gafil avladı Hür Tacir. Kaderin dizginlerini eline almanın önemini açıkladın, teselli etmek için gerçeği saklamadın. Sözlerin… Oldukça cesurdu. Her şeyden öte dürüsttü. Patavatsız gencin tekine sarf ettiğin bu sözlerin değeri, göz ardı edilemez. O anda sana bambaşka bir açıdan bakmaya başladım."
